instructions: You can individually shut down notifications for each app and then individually re-enable them when you re done with work You can switch off Wi-Fi and cellular data to deny Internet access while allowing phone calls and text messages. You can switch on Airplane Mode to turn everything off. You can swipe up from the bottom of the screen and tap on the moon icon to turn on Do Not Disturb . This will stop notifications, alerts and calls when the screen is off. You will still get calls if someone calls twice within 3 minutes so you can get alerted to an emergency. You can allow Favorites or filter by contact Groups.
